Title: Logistics Management System Software


1
Logistics Management System Software
2
Logistics Management System Software
Almost every shipper wants control of the
shipping process. But when creating a logistics
department would be too expensive, many shippers
relinquish the process - and control - to a 3PL
provider.
Logistics software gives you the same control
over shipping as a logistics department would,
but a fraction of the cost.
If problems arise with the software, or if you
need new logistics options, the logistics
management system software provider can resolve
the problem or make the necessary changes.
Logistics software eliminates distance between
the shipper and the shipping process by allowing
the former to become its own logistics provider.

3

Transport Management Software - What is Transport Management Software? A transportation management system, also known as a TMS or transportation management software, provides visibility into daily transportation operations, trade compliance information, and documentation, and ensures the timely delivery of freight and goods. Transportation management systems also make it easier for businesses to manage and optimize their transportation operations, whether by land, air, or sea. Transport management software is a type of software that aids businesses in their transportation operations. It is primarily used to boost efficiency and profit in logistics. TMS Software is a subset of a supply chain management system that can also be a component of an enterprise resource planning system.

What is the Best Logistics
Software?
The best logistics management software is the one
that can be customized as per your specific
business requirements. Moreover, that logistics
management system should also include top-notch
features such as real-time tracking, smart order
allocation, automated route planning
optimization, dynamic route planning, a dedicated
driver app, and end-customer visibility.
Apart from all this, it should also be easy to
integrate with your existing system. Quick
deployment of the software for logistics
management would be an added advantage. Choose
the best logistics software for your business to
save big on the operational, fuel, and overall
logistics cost.

4
Benefits of Shipsys Logistic Management
Software
Reduce the customer complaints by 35
Save up to 20 delivery lead time
Get 100 customer satisfaction
Increase the first-attempt delivery rate by 15
Minimize the logistics cost by 6
Increase DPV (deliveries per vehicle) by 20
Decrease TAT (turnaround time) by 20

5
Why Choose Shipsys Logistics Management
Software?
Shipsy is a SaaS-based logistics transportation
and shipment management software suite provider
that helps companies to digitize their logistics
and transportation operations and interact more
effectively with their customers.We leverage the
latest technology to develop a logistics
management software that fulfills your customized
business requirements and fits in your budget.

Title:
What is the Best Logistics Software?
Description:
Shipsy logistics management software faciliates automation of processes like order segregation, order allocation, route optimization, assigning drivers, AWB generation, print labelling, and more to reduce dependency on human professionals. The logistics management system provided by the company also provide a dedicated driver app for efficient trip management and communicating with the vendor and end-customers. It is the best logistics software for the e-commerce, retail, courier, manufacturing, and other business verticles. The SaaS-based software for logistics management also provide complete visibility for the end-customers. – PowerPoint PPT presentation

What is the Best Logistics
Software?The best logistics management software is the one
that can be customized as per your specific
business requirements.Moreover, that logistics
management system should also include top-notch
features such as real-time tracking, smart order
allocation, automated route planning
optimization, dynamic route planning, a dedicated
driver app, and end-customer visibility.Apart from all this, it should also be easy to
integrate with your existing system.Quick
deployment of the software for logistics
management would be an added advantage.Choose
the best logistics software for your business to
save big on the operational, fuel, and overall
logistics cost.4
Benefits of Shipsys Logistic Management
Software
Reduce the customer complaints by 35
Save up to 20 delivery lead time
Get 100 customer satisfaction
Increase the first-attempt delivery rate by 15
Minimize the logistics cost by 6
Increase DPV (deliveries per vehicle) by 20
Decrease TAT (turnaround time) by 20

Software?Shipsy is a SaaS-based logistics transportation

that helps companies to digitize their logistics

effectively with their customers.We leverage the
latest technology to develop a logistics
management software that fulfills your customized
business requirements and fits in your budget.6
